text: Hɨniavɨdaci 9.22-25 Sng 78.47-48, 105.32 Asɨ Iaue Mosesɨ dɨ abami. Nadɨ human agadɨ mɨŋaiahuavɨla uaiaŋ susu hɨvɨ atɨ lamɨnaŋ avɨli vumɨli lɨba hɨlɨcɨ hɨlɨcɨ me agɨlaŋ Isipɨ fɨli tɨbɨ heŋ mɨgavɨbali uami. Lavɨla hulaŋ iamɨgali sɨhɨm sabaŋ sɨmɨŋ isabɨlaŋ hualabɨla hɨsɨŋ agɨladɨ sɨkasɨkan ifɨcabɨlavɨbali uami.
